content:
- 'Description': Describes the process of disconnecting a device from a network.
  'Identifier': b9c2062315754ad984752f7c
  'Entity':
  - 'Entity-Description': The name of the computer that is experiencing network disconnection.
    'Identifier': d616bd2a521847008b229547
  - 'Entity-Description': The name of the network to which the computer is trying
      to connect.
    'Identifier': 554a1dcb38d04324aeb7e3c2
    'Entity-Examples':
    - MyHomeNetwork
    - OfficeWiFi
    - Starbucks
    - PublicNetwork
    - HomeNetwork
  - 'Entity-Description': The type of network connection the computer is using.
    'Identifier': a46110b53a234242a9612b5d
- 'Description': Describes the issue of a device performing slowly and possible
    solutions.
  'Identifier': 1c0ccc899182432ea1ce0ffc
  'Entity':
  - 'Entity-Description': The reason for the slow performance of the computer.
    'Identifier': 774ce117113f465787c2b3f4
  - 'Entity-Description': The solution to improve the performance of the computer.
    'Identifier': 5bcd393ed54041ca9a4997d6
- 'Description': Describes the process of repairing or replacing faulty hardware
    components on a device.
  'Identifier': 4fef27d462db42b5a8b56baf
  'Entity':
  - 'Entity-Description': The computer component that requires repair.
    'Identifier': 1cfe87e5a37e46a5b20c56eb
  - 'Entity-Description': The brand of the computer component.
    'Identifier': 0dbea03401d046f0962a4b67
  - 'Entity-Description': The model of the computer component.
    'Identifier': 4b1fe69af45544beb4c794ad
  - 'Entity-Description': The specific problem with the computer component.
    'Identifier': 0bbb87988c434c3199097a5d
- 'Description': Covers the process of upgrading or replacing hardware components
    on the device, such as adding more memory or replacing a faulty part.
  'Identifier': 6d612f6fd7df46a98f824b7e
  'Entity':
  - 'Entity-Description': The hardware component to be upgraded.
    'Identifier': 07974cad901f402a934c4fe2
  - 'Entity-Description': The brand of the new hardware component.
    'Identifier': 0c709b1aa4224fb889a0589d
  - 'Entity-Description': The specific model of the new hardware component.
    'Identifier': e80d138fbf1d44fcb8da3286
    'Entity-Examples':
    - i7-9700K
    - Ryzen 9 5900X
    - RTX 3080
    - NVMe M.2 1TB
    - X570
    - RM850x
- 'Description': Describes the optimal performance of a device and how to
    maintain it.
  'Identifier': 8065578b480f45acb8cc9466
  'Entity':
  - 'Entity-Description': The hardware component to upgrade for better performance.
    'Identifier': dfe8ad4bb9ba468cb9c4f766
  - 'Entity-Description': The manufacturer of the desired hardware component.
    'Identifier': 574bbc94f01746b996d988a5
  - 'Entity-Description': The desired memory size for the hardware component.
    'Identifier': ecc7ea7f8d7b4ac2b444eb1d
    'Entity-Examples':
    - 8GB
    - 16GB
    - 32GB
    - 64GB
  - 'Entity-Description': The desired storage capacity for the hardware component.
    'Identifier': 3e52cb2fdba944b595dcb30e
- 'Description': Describes the process of connecting a device to a network.
  'Identifier': 25a25575d2c74fe19298b870
  'Entity':
  - 'Entity-Description': The type of network connection the user is trying to establish.
    'Identifier': 375f652f96664d179ec1f523
    'Entity-Examples':
    - wifi
    - ethernet
    - bluetooth
  - 'Entity-Description': The operating system of the computer.
    'Identifier': 35fe7476b034486a9fefdea5
    'Entity-Examples':
    - Windows
    - MacOS
    - Linux
  - 'Entity-Description': The name of the network the user is trying to connect to.
    'Identifier': b3606045b4344b52afe5af96
  - 'Entity-Description': The error message displayed during the connection attempt.
    'Identifier': 03a1a2a750bb4ee08057b29a
- 'Description': Applies when no intent matches the given utterance.
    'Identifier': 25a25575d2vf5567xs298b87f

**instructions for the model**

You are a chat bot. Above are the intents that you can help the user with. For the provided user input, identify the intent that it closely matches. You must also extract all relevant entities for the chosen intent.

Important details to consider:
	• Each intent has a unique ID associated with it in alphanumeric format. Each intent has its name and description.

	• For each intent there are also entities associated with them. Those are unique values that need to be retrieved for a particular intent. Each entity has a name, Entity-Description and it may also include Entity-Examples, which means the entity must match one of the provided values. If multiple entities are provided, fill all the attributes. If an entity value is not provided, set the value of the entity to "none".
	
	• Generate your response in the following JSON format
If no intent can be identified, please return: {“prediction_intent”: “none _of_the_above”}.
In the case you can identify the intent for the user input, please give your answer in the following format:

 {"output":[{"intent":"id", "entities":[{"entity-Id 1" : "value 1", "entity-Id 2" : "value2"}]}]}

**user inquiry**
I need help with connecting my laptop to the corporate WiFi. Please assist.
